name: "Line" Algorithmic Calligraphy
description: One of the three very first works of algorithmic calligraphy, devoid of any humanism, realness and imperfections. Virtual brush is moving on a mathematically correct circular paths, leaving precise traces with variable pressure. "Line" explores the simplest trace there is, creating a model of a blend of western and eastern calligraphy styles in a digital space. 4000x6000 PNG.
